summary: This document outlines the additions and deletions of beneficiaries to the Butterfly Trust established by Jeffrey E. Epstein. It details the roles of various trustees and the legal authority they have to modify the trust's beneficiaries. The document includes multiple instances of beneficiary additions and deletions, highlighting the ongoing management of the trust.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is identified as the Grantor of the Butterfly Trust, which he established.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Indyke is one of the trustees of the Butterfly Trust and is involved in adding and deleting beneficiaries.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Kahn serves as a trustee of the Butterfly Trust alongside Indyke.

persons.name: Harry I. Beller
persons.context: Beller is mentioned as a current acting trustee of the Butterfly Trust, involved in adding beneficiaries.

persons.name: Erika A. Kellerhals
persons.context: Kellerhals is also a current acting trustee of the Butterfly Trust, participating in the management of beneficiaries.

persons.name: Karyna Shuliak
persons.context: Shuliak is added as a beneficiary to the Butterfly Trust.

persons.name: Susan M. Hamblin
persons.context: Hamblin is added as a beneficiary to the Butterfly Trust.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Maxwell is deleted as a beneficiary from the Butterfly Trust.

connections.description: Epstein is the Grantor of the trust, while Indyke serves as a trustee.

Indyke and Kahn are both trustees of the Butterfly Trust.
Beller and Kellerhals are both acting trustees of the Butterfly Trust.
Beller, as a trustee, adds Shuliak as a beneficiary to the trust.
Beller, as a trustee, adds Hamblin as a beneficiary to the trust.
Beller, as a trustee, deletes Maxwell as a beneficiary from the trust.

events.title: Deletion and Addition of Beneficiaries
events.description: Harry I. Beller and Erika A. Kellerhals delete Ghislaine Maxwell and add Karyna Shuliak, Darren K. Indyke, and Richard Kahn as beneficiaries.

keyFacts: The Butterfly Trust was established by Jeffrey E. Epstein on December 27, 2006.
Harry I. Beller and Erika A. Kellerhals are acting trustees of the Butterfly Trust.
Ghislaine Maxwell was deleted as a beneficiary from the Butterfly Trust.
Karyna Shuliak and Susan M. Hamblin were added as beneficiaries to the Butterfly Trust.
The document includes multiple instances of beneficiary additions and deletions, indicating ongoing management of the trust.
